verses.verse: Adam <S%H121><s%>, Seth <S%H8352><s%>, Enosh <S%H583><s%>,
Kenan <S%H7018><s%>, Mahalalel <S%H4111><s%>, Jared <S%H3382><s%>,
Enoch <S%H2585><s%>, Methuselah <S%H4968><s%>, Lamech <S%H3929><s%>,
Noah <S%H5146><s%>, Shem <S%H8035><s%>, Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and Japheth <S%H3315><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japheth <S%H3315><s%>: Gomer <S%H1586><s%>, and Magog <S%H4031><s%>, and Madai <S%H4074><s%>, and Javan <S%H3120><s%>, and Tubal <S%H8422><s%>, and Meshech <S%H4902><s%>, and Tiras <S%H8494><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gomer <S%H1586><s%>: Ashkenaz <S%H813><s%>, and Diphath <S%H7384><s%>, and Togarmah <S%H8425><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Javan <S%H3120><s%>: Elishah <S%H473><s%>, and Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>, Kittim <S%H3794><s%>, and Rodanim <S%H1721><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>: Cush <S%H3568><s%>, and Mizraim <S%H4714><s%>, Put <S%H6316><s%>, and Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Cush <S%H3568><s%>: Seba <S%H5434><s%>, and Havilah <S%H2341><s%>, and Sabta <S%H5454><s%>, and Raama <S%H7484><s%>, and Sabteca <S%H5455><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Raamah <S%H7484><s%>: Sheba <S%H7614><s%>, and Dedan <S%H1719><s%>.
And Cush <S%H3568><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Nimrod <S%H5248><s%>; he began <S%H2490><s%> to be a mighty <S%H1368><s%> one in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And Mizraim <S%H4714><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ludim <S%H3866><s%>, and Anamim <S%H6047><s%>, and Lehabim <S%H3853><s%>, and Naphtuhim <S%H5320><s%>,
and Pathrusim <S%H6625><s%>, and Casluhim <S%H3695><s%> (from whence came <S%H3318><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>), and Caphtorim <S%H3732><s%>.
And Canaan <S%H3667><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Sidon <S%H6721><s%> his first-born <S%H1060><s%>, and Heth <S%H2845><s%>,
and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>, and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Girgashite <S%H1622><s%>,
and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Arkite <S%H6208><s%>, and the Sinite <S%H5513><s%>,
and the Arvadite <S%H721><s%>, and the Zemarite <S%H6786><s%>, and the Hamathite <S%H2577><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>: Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and Asshur <S%H804><s%>, and Arpachshad <S%H775><s%>, and Lud <S%H3865><s%>, and Aram <S%H758><s%>, and Uz <S%H5780><s%>, and Hul <S%H2343><s%>, and Gether <S%H1666><s%>, and Meshech <S%H4902><s%>.
And Arpachshad <S%H775><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Shelah <S%H7974><s%>, and Shelah <S%H7974><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Eber <S%H5677><s%>.

And unto Eber <S%H5677><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>: the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Peleg <S%H6389><s%>; for in his days <S%H3117><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> was divided <S%H6385><s%>; and his brother <S%H251><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Joktan <S%H3355><s%>.
And Joktan <S%H3355><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Almodad <S%H486><s%>, and Sheleph <S%H8026><s%>, and Hazarmaveth <S%H2700><s%>, and Jerah <S%H3392><s%>,
and Hadoram <S%H1913><s%>, and Uzal <S%H187><s%>, and Diklah <S%H1853><s%>,
and Ebal <S%H5858><s%>, and Abimael <S%H39><s%>, and Sheba <S%H7614><s%>,
and Ophir <S%H211><s%>, and Havilah <S%H2341><s%>, and Jobab <S%H3103><s%>. All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joktan <S%H3355><s%>.
Shem <S%H8035><s%>, Arpachshad <S%H775><s%>, Shelah <S%H7974><s%>,
Serug <S%H8286><s%>, Nahor <S%H5152><s%>, Terah <S%H8646><s%>,
Abram <S%H87><s%> (the same is Abraham <S%H85><s%>).
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>: Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>.
These are their generations <S%H8435><s%>: the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, Nebaioth <S%H5032><s%>; then Kedar <S%H6938><s%>, and Adbeel <S%H110><s%>, and Mibsam <S%H4017><s%>,
Mishma <S%H4927><s%>, and Dumah <S%H1746><s%>, Massa <S%H4854><s%>, Hadad <S%H2301><s%>, and Tema <S%H8485><s%>,
Jetur <S%H3195><s%>, Naphish <S%H5305><s%>, and Kedemah <S%H6929><s%>. These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keturah <S%H6989><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s concubine <S%H6370><s%>: she bare <S%H3205><s%> Zimran <S%H2175><s%>, and Jokshan <S%H3370><s%>, and Medan <S%H4091><s%>, and Midian <S%H4080><s%>, and Ishbak <S%H3435><s%>, and Shuah <S%H7744><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jokshan <S%H3370><s%>: Sheba <S%H7614><s%>, and Dedan <S%H1719><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>: Ephah <S%H5891><s%>, and Epher <S%H6081><s%>, and Hanoch <S%H2585><s%>, and Abida <S%H28><s%>, and Eldaah <S%H420><s%>. All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keturah <S%H6989><s%>.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%>. The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>: Esau <S%H6215><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>: Eliphaz <S%H464><s%>, Reuel <S%H7467><s%>, and Jeush <S%H3266><s%>, and Jalam <S%H3281><s%>, and Korah <S%H7141><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliphaz <S%H464><s%>: Teman <S%H8487><s%>, and Omar <S%H201><s%>, Zephi <S%H6825><s%>, and Gatam <S%H1609><s%>, Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>, and Timna <S%H8555><s%>, and Amalek <S%H6002><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%>: Nahath <S%H5184><s%>, Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, Shammah <S%H8048><s%>, and Mizzah <S%H4199><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Seir <S%H8165><s%>: Lotan <S%H3877><s%>, and Shobal <S%H7732><s%>, and Zibeon <S%H6649><s%>, and Anah <S%H6034><s%>, and Dishon <S%H1787><s%>, and Ezer <S%H687><s%>, and Dishan <S%H1789><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lotan <S%H3877><s%>: Hori <S%H2753><s%>, and Homam <S%H1950><s%>; and Timna <S%H8555><s%> was Lotan <S%H3877><s%>'s sister <S%H269><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shobal <S%H7732><s%>: Alian <S%H5935><s%>, and Manahath <S%H4506><s%>, and Ebal <S%H5858><s%>, Shephi <S%H8195><s%>, and Onam <S%H208><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zibeon <S%H6649><s%>: Aiah <S%H345><s%>, and Anah <S%H6034><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%>: Dishon <S%H1787><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dishon <S%H1787><s%>: Hamran <S%H2566><s%>, and Eshban <S%H790><s%>, and Ithran <S%H3506><s%>, and Cheran <S%H3763><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ezer <S%H687><s%>: Bilhan <S%H1092><s%>, and Zaavan <S%H2190><s%>, Jaakan <S%H3292><s%>. The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dishan <S%H1789><s%>: Uz <S%H5780><s%>, and Aran <S%H765><s%>.

Now these are the kings <S%H4428><s%> that reigned <S%H4427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> there reigned <S%H4427><s%> any king <S%H4428><s%> over the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Bela <S%H1106><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%>; and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Dinhabah <S%H1838><s%>.
And Bela <S%H1106><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Jobab <S%H3103><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> of Bozrah <S%H1224><s%> reigned in his stead <S%H4427><s%>.
And Jobab <S%H3103><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Husham <S%H2367><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Temanites <S%H8489><s%> reigned in his stead <S%H4427><s%>.

And Husham <S%H2367><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Hadad <S%H1908><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bedad <S%H911><s%>, who smote <S%H5221><s%> Midian <S%H4080><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead <S%H8034><s%>; and the name of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Avith <S%H5762><s%>.
And Hadad <S%H1908><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Samlah <S%H8072><s%> of Masrekah <S%H4957><s%> reigned in his stead <S%H4427><s%>.
And Samlah <S%H8072><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> of Rehoboth <S%H7344><s%> by the River <S%H5104><s%> reigned in his stead <S%H4427><s%>.
And Shaul <S%H7586><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Baal-hanan <S%H1177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Achbor <S%H5907><s%> reigned in his stead <S%H4427><s%>.

And Baal-hanan <S%H1177><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Hadad <S%H1908><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead <S%H8034><s%>; and the name of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Pai <S%H6464><s%>: and his wife <S%H802><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Mehetabel <S%H4105><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Matred <S%H4308><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Me-zahab <S%H4314><s%>.

And Hadad <S%H1908><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>. And the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> were <S%H441><s%>: chief Timna <S%H8555><s%>, chief <S%H441><s%> Aliah <S%H5933><s%>, chief <S%H441><s%> Jetheth <S%H3509><s%>,
chief <S%H441><s%> Oholibamah <S%H173><s%>, chief <S%H441><s%> Elah <S%H425><s%>, chief <S%H441><s%> Pinon <S%H6373><s%>,
chief <S%H441><s%> Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>, chief <S%H441><s%> Teman <S%H8487><s%>, chief <S%H441><s%> Mibzar <S%H4014><s%>,
chief <S%H441><s%> Magdiel <S%H4025><s%>, chief <S%H441><s%> Iram <S%H5902><s%>. These are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>.
